text: The Grass Is Greener is a 1960 British romantic comedy movie directed by Stanley Donen and starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Robert Mitchum, Jean Simmons. The movie is based on the 1956 play of the same name written by Hugh Williams and Margaret Vyner and was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1960 romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Donen
title: The Grass Is Greener
